text: Kris Nathan Humphries (born February 6, 1985) is an American professional basketball player who played for the Utah Jazz, then with the Toronto Raptors, then with Dallas Mavericks, and for the Brooklyn Nets. He retired in 2019. Humphries was born on February 6, 1985 in Minneapolis, Minnesota.Kris Humphries Statistics , basketball-reference.com, Retrieved April 29, 2007. Humphries married Kim Kardashian in 2011, but filed for divorce a couple of months after their marriage. Their divorce was finalized on June 3, 2013. Kris Humphries and Kim Kardashian's marriage lasted for 72 days before they filed for divorce. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Brooklyn Nets players Category:Dallas Mavericks players Category:New Jersey Nets players Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:Phoenix Suns players Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis Category:Toronto Raptors players Category:Utah Jazz players Category:Washington Wizards players
title: Kris Humphries
